instructions.title: How To Delete Your Walmart Account
instructions.before: There is no easy option to delete your Walmart Account.  You must contact customer service and request Account deletion.  You can do this by following the steps below or calling the customer service number listed for Walmart on this site.
instructions.after: Once this process is complete, Walmart will call you or send you a confirmation email letting you know that your account has been deleted.

qnAnswers.question: Is there an easier way to delete my account other than contacting customer service?
qnAnswers.answer: No. In order to permanently delete your Walmart.com Account you must contact Customer Service and request account deletion. Since this is a difficult process, we  suggest you change your personal information from their site prior to this, essentially making your data useless to them.

qnAnswers.question: How do I remove my personal information from Walmart.com?
qnAnswers.answer: You need to change all of your personal information stored on the site. You do this by going to your profile settings. Once there, change all fields with personal information so none of the information logged is yours. Because an account at Walmart.com cannot be deleted easily, we suggest you do this to make your data useless.

steps: [Go to the Walmart Website] (https://www.walmart.com/). If you're already logged in, doing so will open your Walmart home page
Click the Profile Icon on the Top Right
Click the Computer Image that says Walmart.com under Contact us
Click Shopping at Walmart.com under Choose your Topic
Click Manage Account under What can we help you with
Fill in your information and type “I would like to Delete my Account” under reasons for contacting us. Then Click Submit
Copy Confirmation Code to reference to Customer Service
